'''Long-Lost Chapters''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Forest of Jnana and Vidya]]''.

In [[Devantaka Mountain]], the soundtrack plays in the cave behind the [[Ruin Golem (Devantaka Mountain)|Ruin Golem]].
